net.jordaria.gui

Class SwingMainWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.WindowAdapter
      • net.jordaria.gui.SwingMainWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.WindowFocusListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.awt.event.WindowStateListener, java.util.EventListener, Listener

    public class SwingMainWindow
extends java.awt.event.WindowAdapter
implements Listener, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener
    The main window for the program. This is the swing version, as opposed to the opengl window.
    Author:
    Ches Burks

      SwingMainWindow()
      Constructs a new SwingMainWindow to serve as the gui.
